org.anhcraft.spaciouslib.mojang

Class SkinAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.anhcraft.spaciouslib.mojang.SkinAPI

  • public class SkinAPI
extends java.lang.Object
    A class helps you to manage player skins

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SkinAPI()
      Initializes SkinAPI

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static CachedSkin downloadSkin(java.util.UUID player, int cachedTime)
      Downloads a skin from Mojang server and gets the result as a CachedSkin object.
      Warning: The limit request is 1 request/minute
      static CachedSkin fromJSON(java.lang.String json)
      Deserializes the given JSON string to its CachedSkin object
      static CachedSkin getSkin(java.util.UUID player)
      Gets a cached skin.
      It will download a new one if the skin doesn't exist.
      static CachedSkin getSkin(java.util.UUID player, int cachedTime)
      Gets a cached skin.
      It will download a new one if the skin doesn't exist.
      static java.io.File getSkinFile(CachedSkin skin)
      Gets the cache file of the given skin
      static java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.util.UUID,CachedSkin> getSkins()
      Gets all cached skins
      static CachedSkin renewSkin(java.util.UUID player)
      Forces renew an existed cached skin.
      Warning: all changes are temporary and will be removed when the plugin loads
      static java.lang.String toJSON(CachedSkin skin)
      Serializes the given CachedSkin object to a JSON string

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • downloadSkin

        public static CachedSkin downloadSkin(java.util.UUID player,
                                      int cachedTime)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Downloads a skin from Mojang server and gets the result as a CachedSkin object.
        Warning: The limit request is 1 request/minute
        Parameters:
        player - the unique id of the skin owner
        cachedTime - the cached time
        Returns:
        the CachedSkin object
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getSkin

        public static CachedSkin getSkin(java.util.UUID player)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Gets a cached skin.
        It will download a new one if the skin doesn't exist.
        Parameters:
        player - the unique id of the skin owner
        Returns:
        the CachedSkin object
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getSkin

        public static CachedSkin getSkin(java.util.UUID player,
                                 int cachedTime)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Gets a cached skin.
        It will download a new one if the skin doesn't exist.
        Parameters:
        player - the unique id of the skin owner
        cachedTime - the cached time for the skin (only need when the skin doesn't exist)
        Returns:
        the CachedSkin object
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getSkins

        public static java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.util.UUID,CachedSkin> getSkins()
        Gets all cached skins
        Returns:
        a map of cached skins

      • renewSkin

        public static CachedSkin renewSkin(java.util.UUID player)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Forces renew an existed cached skin.
        Warning: all changes are temporary and will be removed when the plugin loads
        Parameters:
        player - the unique id of the skin owner
        Returns:
        the new CachedSkin object
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • toJSON

        public static java.lang.String toJSON(CachedSkin skin)
        Serializes the given CachedSkin object to a JSON string

        Returns:
        the JSON string

        public static java.io.File getSkinFile(CachedSkin skin)
